We Are: Accenture's Transmission and Distribution practice, and we’re powering the progress to a safe, connected, and sustainable planet. Every day, we work with the largest electric, gas, and water utilities to produce cutting-edge solutions that help them become more efficient, reliable, environmentally friendly, and safer places to work. Our utility clients are looking for bold solutions in the era of rapidly changing technology, policy, and workforce innovations. We exist to bring the future to life in the core of our clients’ operations, working with them at Accenture Innovation Hubs around the world and at their sites locally. As the marketplace leader in modernizing the Transmission and Distribution network, we’re looking for leaders to help us make it more resilient, secure, and flexible to include new distributed energy resources. Will you join us in co-creating the future Visit our site to learn more about Utilities Consulting Services | Accenture

Introduction
   A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe.
   
   You'll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio; including Software and Red Hat.
   
   Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you'll be encouraged to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centers on long-term career growth and development opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.
   
   
  Your Role and Responsibilities
   IBM Global Business Services (GBS) is a team of business, strategy and technology consultants enabling enterprises to make smarter decisions and providing unparalleled client and consumer experiences in cognitive, data analytics, cloud technology and mobile app development. With global reach, outcome-focused methodologies and deep industry expertise, IBM GBS empowers clients to digitally reinvent their business and get the competitive edge in the cognitive era in over 170 countries.
   
   What You’ll Do:
   IBM is interviewing now for SAP S/4HANA Order to Cash Transformation Leaders. This future IBMer will have deep experience driving order to cash transformation discussions with line of business stakeholders, developing a roadmap and implementation strategy using next generation SAP order to cash solutions and articulating clear business outcomes and benefits. This go to market role will also be responsible for recommending solutions that amplify business value using exponential technologies on top of the S/4 digital core. This consultant should have experience in S/4HANA implementations or migration and deployment of these solutions. The role will require excellent communication skills and will be tasked with leading business driven conversations at all organizational levels from analyst to the C-Suite.
   
   
   
  Required Technical and Professional Expertise
   
  
    At least 10 years of experience in SAP Order to Cash with minimum 3 end-to-end implementations from project preparation to go-live, and 7+ years of consulting experience
    At least 3 years of implementation or migration experience with SAP S/4HANA
    Team lead experience on at least 1 Full life cycle project of S/4HANA Order to Cash
    At least 3 years experience with digital business process transformation in the manufacturing line of business
    At least 2 years of solid business process fit gap or establishment of new manufacturing target operating model experience
  
   
   
   
  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

    Experience driving SAP value with RPA, Machine Learning, AI, Blockchain, IoT and Cloud are a plus
    Broad business development and pre-sales background
  
 
 
  
    
    About Business Unit
   IBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.
   
 
 
   This job requires you to provide your COVID-19 vaccination status with supporting documentation, where legally permissible.
 
 
  
    
    Your Life @ IBM
   In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
